Summary table of daily data

daily_gwl_summary.Rd

Summary table of daily data

daily_gwl_summary(gw_level_dv, p_code_dv, statCd)

Arguments

gw_level_dv

daily groundwater level data from readNWISdv
p_code_dv

the parameter code used
statCd

the statistic code used

Value

a summary table giving the period of record, completeness and percentile values

Examples


# site <- "263819081585801"
p_code_dv <- "62610"
statCd <- "00001"
# gw_level_dv <- dataRetrieval::readNWISdv(site, p_code_dv, statCd = statCd)
gw_level_dv <- L2701_example_data$Daily
daily_gwl_summary(gw_level_dv, p_code_dv, statCd)
#>   begin_date   end_date  days percent_complete lowest_level     p5    p10
#> 1 1978-10-01 2019-12-11 14362               95       -51.08 -38.57 -34.04
#>      p25    p50    p75     p90   p95 highest_level
#> 1 -28.56 -21.97 -16.89 -11.871 -9.09         -2.81
